rules_text:
Flying, menace
[i]Song of the Night Sparrow –[/i] {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“There are relatively many youkai who use songs or cries to bewilder humans on dark roads or in deserted forests at night.”
— Hieda no Akyuu, [/i]The Gensokyo Chronicle[i][/i]
